Dataset Name: Geographical Original of Music Data Set
Brief description: Audio features of music samples from different locations.
Preprocessing: Audio features extracted using MARSYAS software.
Reference: Zhou, Fang, Q. Claire, and Ross D. King. "Predicting the geographical origin of music." Data Mining (ICDM), 2014 IEEE International Conference on. IEEE, 2014. hdl-access = free
Creator: F. Zhou et al.

Brief description: Audio features from one million different songs.
Reference: Bertin-Mahieux, Thierry, et al. "The million song dataset." ISMIR 2011: Proceedings of the 12th International Society for Music Information Retrieval Conference, 24–28 October 2011, Miami, Florida. University of Miami, 2011. year = 2011
Creator: T. Bertin-Mahieux et al.

Brief description: Audio under Creative Commons from 100k songs (343 days, 1TiB) with a hierarchy of 161 genres, metadata, user data, free-form text.
Creator: M. Defferrard et al.
